recipesJson.name: mlNikon's Pecoffee Ice Cream
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: This is just a delicious, delicious daap bomb of goodness. Toffee ice cream drizzled with caramel and topped with roasted butter pecans. Basically this is just one big experiment because I wanted to put some of my favorite flavors from vt all in one mix to see what happened...the result...flavor town!
